001package com.exoreaction.xorcery.junit;
002
003import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
004import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
005import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationBuilder;
006import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.builder.ConfigurationLogger;
007import com.exoreaction.xorcery.core.LoggerContextFactory;
008import com.exoreaction.xorcery.core.Xorcery;
009import com.exoreaction.xorcery.io.ZipFiles;
010import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
011import org.junit.jupiter.api.TestInstance;
012import org.junit.jupiter.api.extension.*;
013
014import java.io.File;
015import java.io.IOException;
016import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
017import java.net.URISyntaxException;
018import java.nio.file.Files;
019import java.nio.file.Path;
020import java.util.Comparator;
021import java.util.function.Consumer;
022
023/**
024 * JUnit Extension to create Xorcery instances. It is possible to specify instance id (to easily look up the instance within tests), configuration,
025 * and optionally provide a Zip archive name from src/test/resources which is unzipped into home directory data.
026 * <p>
027 * If an archive is provided the home directory data is not deleted after the test finishes to make subsequent tests with the same test data run faster.
028 */
029@TestInstance(TestInstance.Lifecycle.PER_CLASS)
030public class XorceryExtension
031        implements
032        TestExecutionExceptionHandler,
033        ParameterResolver,
034        BeforeAllCallback,
035        AfterAllCallback {
036    public static final ExtensionContext.Namespace NAMESPACE = ExtensionContext.Namespace.create("xorcery");
037
038    private final Configuration configuration;
039    private final boolean isArchive;
040    private Xorcery xorcery;
041    private File tempDir;
042    private boolean hasError = false;
043
044    public static Builder xorcery() {
045        return new Builder();
046    }
047
048    public static final class Builder {
049
050        private String instanceId;
051        private String archiveFileName;
052        private String targetDir;
053        private ConfigurationBuilder configurationBuilder = new ConfigurationBuilder();
054
055        public Builder id(String instanceId) {
056            this.instanceId = instanceId;
057            return this;
058        }
059
060        public Builder archive(String archiveFileName) {
061            return archive(archiveFileName, archiveFileName.split("\\.")[0]);
062        }
063
064        public Builder archive(String archiveFileName, String targetDir) {
065            this.archiveFileName = archiveFileName;
066            this.targetDir = targetDir;
067            return this;
068        }
069
070        public Builder configuration(Consumer<ConfigurationBuilder> configurationBuilderConsumer) {
071            configurationBuilderConsumer.accept(configurationBuilder);
072            return this;
073        }
074
075        public Builder addYaml(String yamlConfig) {
076            configurationBuilder.addYaml(yamlConfig);
077            return this;
078        }
079
080        public XorceryExtension build() {
081
082            if (instanceId != null)
083                configurationBuilder.with(b -> b.add("instance.id", instanceId));
084
085            try {
086                File tempDir;
087                if (archiveFileName == null) {
088                    tempDir = Files.createTempDirectory(Path.of("target"), "xorcery").toFile();
089                } else {
090                    File zipFile = Path.of(Resources.getResource(archiveFileName).orElseThrow(() -> new IllegalArgumentException("File not found in classpath:" + archiveFileName)).toURI()).toFile();
091                    tempDir = Path.of("target", targetDir).toFile();
092                    if (!tempDir.exists()) {
093                        ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log("Unzipping " + archiveFileName);
094                        ZipFiles.unzip(zipFile, tempDir);
095                    } else if (tempDir.lastModified() < zipFile.lastModified()) {
096                        ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log("Updating " + archiveFileName);
097                        Files.walk(tempDir.toPath())
098                                .sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
099                                .map(Path::toFile)
100                                .forEach(File::delete);
101                        ZipFiles.unzip(zipFile, tempDir);
102                    } else {
103                        ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log("Unzipped " + archiveFileName + " already exists");
104                    }
105                }
106
107                configurationBuilder.with(b -> b.add("instance.home", tempDir.getAbsolutePath()));
108
109                return new XorceryExtension(archiveFileName != null, tempDir, configurationBuilder.build());
110            } catch (IOException e) {
111                throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
112            } catch (URISyntaxException e) {
113                throw new RuntimeException(e);
114            }
115
116        }
117    }
118
119    public XorceryExtension(boolean isArchive, File tempDir, Configuration configuration) {
120        this.isArchive = isArchive;
121        this.tempDir = tempDir;
122        this.configuration = configuration;
123    }
124
125    @Override
126    public void beforeAll(ExtensionContext extensionContext) throws Exception {
127
128        try {
129            // Log final configuration
130            ConfigurationLogger.getLogger().log("Configuration:\n" + configuration);
131            LoggerContextFactory.initialize(configuration);
132            xorcery = new Xorcery(configuration);
133        } catch (Exception e) {
134            throw new RuntimeException(e);
135        }
136
137        ExtensionContext.Store store = extensionContext.getRoot().getStore(NAMESPACE);
138        store.put(InstanceConfiguration.get(configuration).getId(), xorcery);
139        store.put(ExtensionContext.class, extensionContext);
140    }
141
142    @Override
143    public void afterAll(ExtensionContext context) throws Exception {
144        if (xorcery != null)
145        {
146            xorcery.close();
147
148            // Allow archive temp dirs to survive between tests to speed things up
149            if (!isArchive && !hasError) {
150                Files.walk(tempDir.toPath())
151                        .sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
152                        .map(Path::toFile)
153                        .forEach(File::delete);
154            }
155        }
156    }
157
158    @Override
159    public boolean supportsParameter(ParameterContext parameterContext, ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
160        return extensionContext.getStore(NAMESPACE).get(parameterContext.getParameter().getType()) != null;
161    }
162
163    @Override
164    public Object resolveParameter(ParameterContext parameterContext, ExtensionContext extensionContext) {
165        return extensionContext.getStore(NAMESPACE).get(parameterContext.getParameter().getType());
166    }
167
168    @Override
169    public void handleTestExecutionException(ExtensionContext context, Throwable throwable) throws Throwable {
170        hasError = true;
171        throw throwable;
172    }
173
174    public Xorcery getXorcery() {
175        return xorcery;
176    }
177}
